stack = "hellohttp"

service {
  name = "hellohttp"
  image = "joonas/hellohttp"
  version = "v2"
  how_to_update = "parallel-one-at-a-time"
  ingress_public = "80/HostRegexp:hellohttp.com"
  ram_mb = 16
}

-------------
version: "3.5"
services:
  hellohttp:
    deploy:
      labels:
        traefik.enable: "true"
        traefik.frontend.entryPoints: public_http,public_https
        traefik.frontend.rule: HostRegexp:hellohttp.com
        traefik.port: "80"
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        order: start-first
      resources:
        limits:
          memory: "16777216"
    image: joonas/hellohttp:v2
networks:
  default:
    external:
      name: fn61
